languages.text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: При смерти этого существа появляется чумное облако, которое лечит союзников этого существа и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} врагам до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and damages its enemies until the end of combat.
When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

languages.text: При смерти этого существа появляется чумное облако, которое лечит союзников этого существа и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} врагам до конца боя.
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

languages.text: この生物は死ぬときに戦闘終了時まで味方を癒し、敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるプレーグの雲を発生させる。
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: この生物は死ぬ時に戦闘終了時まで味方を癒し、敵にダメージを与えるプレーグの雲を発生させる。

languages.text: 此生物死亡时会释放疫病云雾，治疗盟友，{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}敌人，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 此生物死亡时会释放疫病云雾，治疗盟友，伤害敌人，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Al morir, esta criatura genera una nube de plaga que cura a sus aliados y {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daña{/g} a sus enemigos hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Al morir, esta criatura genera una nube de plaga que cura a sus aliados y daña a sus enemigos hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Wenn sie stirbt, hinterlässt diese Kreatur eine Seuchenwolke, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes ihre Verbündeten heilt und bei ihren Feinden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} verursacht.
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn sie stirbt, hinterlässt diese Kreatur eine Seuchenwolke, die bis zum Ende des Kampfes ihre Verbündeten heilt und bei ihren Feinden Schaden verursacht.

languages.text: Lorsqu'elle meurt, cette créature émet un Nuage de Peste qui soigne ses alliés et inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à ses ennemis jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: When dying, this creature creates a plague cloud that heals its allies and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} its enemies until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'elle meurt, cette créature émet un Nuage de Peste qui soigne ses alliés et inflige des dégâts à ses ennemis jusqu'à la fin du combat.
